metadata.name: User Added to Local Administrators Group
metadata.comment: Detects addition of users to the local administrator group via "Net" or "Add-LocalGroupMember".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('localgroup ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /add')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add-localgroupmember ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -group ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' administrators ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' administrateur'))))

output.summary: Detects addition of users to the local administrator group via "Net" or "Add-LocalGroupMember".
